topic.title: Import/Export Data
topic.section:
The Import/Export Data feature, available from Press Management, allows the Press Manager to inject data into and extract data from OMP.

Data import/export is implemented using plugins, with each format or type of data being provided by a different plugin. For more information, refer to each plugin's documentation, found within OMP' plugin directory.

Five Import/Export plugins ship with OMP, and are documented below.

Import/export functionality is also available as a command-line tool; see tools/importExport.php for more information.
The Users XML Plugin can be used to import and export users and their roles. See the XML DTD in "plugins/importexport/users/users.dtd" for more information.
